body: This metal bookplate is inscribed with mystical words in Draconic, leaving space for a single written name. When the bookplate is glued to the inside cover of a book, the named individual may speak the title of the book to summon it as if using instant summons. This ability functions once per day.
name: Bookplate of Recall
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Bookplate of Recall
